{
    "number": 326342,
    "data": "1,3,49,7443,6092721",
    "name": "Number of n X n binary matrices with total support.",
    "comment": [
        "A nonnegative matrix has total support if it is nonzero and for every positive entry there exists a permutation of the columns such that the positive entry is a diagonal entry afterwards and all diagonal entries are positive afterwards.",
        "Number of n X n binary matrices generated by applying the sign function on the entries of a doubly stochastic n X n matrix. - [R. Sinkhorn and P. Knopp (1967)]"
    ],
    "link": [
        "R. Sinkhorn and P. Knopp, <a href=\"https://projecteuclid.org/euclid.pjm/1102992505\">Concerning nonnegative matrices and doubly stochastic matrices</a>, Pacific Journal of Mathematics, 21(2):343-348, 1967.",
        "Christian Stricker, <a href=\"/A326342/a326342.txt\">All such matrices for n = 3</a>",
        "Christian Stricker, <a href=\"/A326342/a326342_1.txt\">All such matrices for n = 4</a>"
    ],
    "example": [
        "For n = 2 the a(2) = 3 matrices are:",
        "  [1 1]  [1 0]  [0 1]",
        "  [1 1], [0 1], [1 0]."
    ],
    "xref": [
        "A326343 counts only the inequivalent matrices."
    ],
    "keyword": "nonn,more",
    "offset": "1,2",
